entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The type or namespace name are missing a using directive or an assembly reference? #37884
  • .NET 8 fails to resolve workload on Fedora #37880
  • [9.0.100-alpha.1.24055.6] dotnet tool install command doesn't show install successful message #37879

Closed

  • 8.0.1 hosting bundle no longer allows net8.0-windows #37892

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add dotnet package search #37916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove TaskWithAssemblyResolveHooks #37913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #37910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #37908
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37900
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unset SuppressTfmSupportBuildWarnings #37897
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove extraneous issue template option #37805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add comment #37753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37791
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Update the framework for It_publishes_with_or_without_apphost test #37834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #37846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #37852
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #37850
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #37849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #37848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #37847
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #37845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2350475 #37856
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [fix #37501] Consolidate message emission for dotnet tool install in default verbosity mode(quiet) #37853
    Area-Tools
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (6.0) #37793
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (7.0) #37794
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
